description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Make sure Vietnamworks  and internal infrastructure running smoothly and high uptime. Daily support to end users to trouble shoot theirs problem.
              

              • Maintain Vietnamworks and internal infrastructure
              
              • Improving network, system and implement infrastructure.
              
              • Improving network, system security.
              
              • Help-desk support to Suong Nguyet Anh & Sunwah offices end users for PC, network, email, and applications.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              • Have 3 years experience or more
              
              • Have deep knowledge of virtualization technology, VCP is preferable
              
              • Deep knowledge of networking: CCNA, MCSE, CCNP is preferable
              
              • Have base knowledge of Linux (Centos, Ubuntu…)
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Health checkup every year and Premium Health Care Package
               







                Career Development Training Course
               







                Actively and dynamic working environment
